/blogs/plugins/tinymce_plugin/tiny_mce/utils/ -> editable_selects.js (source)

[Summary view] [Print] [Text view] 

   1  /**
   2   * $Id: editable_selects.js 829 2012-02-14 07:33:03Z attila $
   3   *
   4   * Makes select boxes editable.
   5   *
   6   * Copyright 2009, Moxiecode Systems AB
   7   * Released under LGPL License.
   8   *
   9   * License: http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/license
  10   * Contributing: http://tinymce.moxiecode.com/contributing
  11   */
  12  
  13  var TinyMCE_EditableSelects = {
  14      editSelectElm : null,
  15  
  16      init : function() {
  17          var nl = document.getElementsByTagName("select"), i, d = document, o;
  18  
  19          for (i=0; i<nl.length; i++) {
  20              if (nl[i].className.indexOf('mceEditableSelect') != -1) {
  21                  o = new Option(tinyMCEPopup.editor.translate('value'), '__mce_add_custom__');
  22  
  23                  o.className = 'mceAddSelectValue';
  24  
  25                  nl[i].options[nl[i].options.length] = o;
  26                  nl[i].onchange = TinyMCE_EditableSelects.onChangeEditableSelect;
  27              }
  28          }
  29      },
  30  
  31      onChangeEditableSelect : function(e) {
  32          var d = document, ne, se = window.event ? window.event.srcElement : e.target;
  33  
  34          if (se.options[se.selectedIndex].value == '__mce_add_custom__') {
  35              ne = d.createElement("input");
  36              ne.id = se.id + "_custom";
  37              ne.name = se.name + "_custom";
  38              ne.type = "text";
  39  
  40              ne.style.width = se.offsetWidth + 'px';
  41              se.parentNode.insertBefore(ne, se);
  42              se.style.display = 'none';
  43              ne.focus();
  44              ne.onblur = TinyMCE_EditableSelects.onBlurEditableSelectInput;
  45              ne.onkeydown = TinyMCE_EditableSelects.onKeyDown;
  46              TinyMCE_EditableSelects.editSelectElm = se;
  47          }
  48      },
  49  
  50      onBlurEditableSelectInput : function() {
  51          var se = TinyMCE_EditableSelects.editSelectElm;
  52  
  53          if (se) {
  54              if (se.previousSibling.value != '') {
  55                  addSelectValue(document.forms[0], se.id, se.previousSibling.value, se.previousSibling.value);
  56                  selectByValue(document.forms[0], se.id, se.previousSibling.value);
  57              } else
  58                  selectByValue(document.forms[0], se.id, '');
  59  
  60              se.style.display = 'inline';
  61              se.parentNode.removeChild(se.previousSibling);
  62              TinyMCE_EditableSelects.editSelectElm = null;
  63          }
  64      },
  65  
  66      onKeyDown : function(e) {
  67          e = e || window.event;
  68  
  69          if (e.keyCode == 13)
  70              TinyMCE_EditableSelects.onBlurEditableSelectInput();
  71      }
  72  };
